amendment.description: Amendment offered as a substitute to the Burton amendment (A033) limits funds from the Development Assistance Fund for India to not more than $65 million. The amendment subsequently failed with the rejection of the Burton amendment on Roll Call No. 446.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered as a substitute amendment to the Burton amendment (as amended), to limit funds from the Development Assistance Fund for India to not more than $65 million and specifying that the $65 million dollar limitation shall not apply to assistance provided to non-governmental and private voluntary groups operating in India.

action.text: Substitute (A035) offered by Mr. Volkmer to the Burton amendment (A033).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Volkmer amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 284 - 118 (Roll no. 445).
